summary.para: Contains classes which implement the main functionality of the DXCarousel for WPF suite. To use these classes in XAML code, add the xmlns:dxca=”“ namespace reference.
Represents an ItemsControl allowing you to easily represent any data using a Carousel.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselItemsControl.Carousel

summary.para: For internal use.

member.value: A object that represents the panel template of this ItemsControl.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Represents a navigator control allowing end-users to scroll through carousel items.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselNavigator.Carousel

summary.para: Specifies the controlled by this navigator.

member.value: A object specifying the bound carousel control.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Represents the Carousel control.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ActivateItemOnClick

summary.para: Gets or sets whether clicking an item will activate it (move it to the Carousel’s attractor point).

member.value: true to respond to item mouse clicks by selecting them; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ActiveItem

summary.para: Gets or sets the active item.

member.value: A UIElement object representing the required item.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ActiveItemIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the active item by its index.

member.value: An integer value specifying the active item’s index in the source sequence.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.AnimationDisabled

summary.para: Specifies whether animation effects for item transitions are enabled.

member.value: true, to disable animated transitions; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.AnimationTime

summary.para: Specifies the time taken by transition animations.

member.value: An integer value specifying the time interval in milliseconds.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.AttractorPointIndex

summary.para: Specifies the active element’s position within the Carousel.

member.value: An integer value specifying the position for the selected item among other items.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Identifies the attached property.
For internal use.
Activates the first item in the Carousel’s Children collection.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.FirstVisibleItemIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the first visible item.

member.value: An integer value specifying the first visible item’s index.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.GetCarousel(System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl)

summary.para: Gets the value of the attached property for the specified object.

member.param: An ItemsControl object whose value of the CarouselPanel attached property is to be returned.
member.returns: A object that is used to render items belonging to the specified itemsControl.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.GetItemsMovingPath

summary.para: Returns a PathGeometry object that represents the function specified by the property.

member.returns: A PathGeometry object that represents the function.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.GetParameters(System.Windows.UIElement)

summary.para: Gets the value of the attached property for the specified object.

member.param: The object whose value of the attached property is to be returned.
member.returns: The value of the attached property for the specified object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.IsAutoSizeItem

summary.para: Gets or sets whether carousel items are automatically resized when changing the control’s size.

member.value: true to automatically resize items with the parent control; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.IsInvertedDirection

summary.para: Gets or sets whether items move forward or backward along the specified path.

member.value: true to force the control to move items backwards along the specified path; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.IsRepeat

summary.para: Gets or sets whether carousel scrolling is limited by the first and last item.

member.value: true to disable scrolling limits; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ItemMovingPath

summary.para: Gets or sets the path along which the Carousel’s items are evenly arranged.

member.value: A value that specifies the item path.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ItemSize

summary.para: Specifies the initial item size.

member.value: A structure defining the initial item size.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Activates the last item in the Carousel’s Children collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.Move(System.Int32)

summary.para: Scrolls the view by the specified number of items.

member.param: An integer value specifying scrolling direction and distance.

summary.para: Scrolls the view to display the first page.
Scrolls the view to the last page.
Scrolls the view to activate the next element.
Scrolls the view to the next page.
Scrolls the view to activate the previous element.
Scrolls the view to the prevoius page.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.MoveTo(System.Int32)

summary.para: Navigates to the item located at the specified index, without an animation effect.

member.param: The index of the required item.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.MoveTo(System.Windows.UIElement)

summary.para: Navigates to a specific item, without an animation effect.

member.param: A Carousel item to be activated.

summary.para: Activates the next item.
Scrolls the Carousel’s items forward, making the next page of the items visible.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.OffsetAnimationAddFunction

summary.para: Gets or sets the function whose values are added to the function when calculating positions of an item during its animation (its movement from one position to another).

member.value: A descendant that represents a corresponding function.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.OffsetDistributionFunction

summary.para: Gets or sets the function that calculates the relative positions of the CarouselPanel’s items along the path.

member.value: A descendant that represents a corresponding function.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.ParameterSet

summary.para: Gets or sets the collection of custom parameters that vary, according to a specific law.

member.value: A object that represents a collection of custom parameters.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Identifies the attached property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.PathPadding

summary.para: Specifies the path’s padding within the control’s boundaries.

member.value: A Thickness object specifying padding distances.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.PathSizingMode

summary.para: Gets or sets how the specified path should be resized when resizing the control.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying how the path’s aspect ratio is changed when resizing the carousel.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.PathVisible

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the control draws a line indicating the item path.

member.value: true to draw a line indicating the item path; otherwise false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.PointPathFunction

summary.para: Gets or sets a piece-linear function that specifies a path for the Carousel’s items.

member.value: A DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.PieceLinearFunction object that specifies the path.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Activates the previous item.
Scrolls the Carousel’s items backward, making the previous page of items visible.
For internal use.
Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.SnapItemsToDevicePixels

summary.para: Gets or sets whether items are rendered in accordance to device pixels.

member.value: true if items are rendered in accordance to device pixels; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Carousel.CarouselPanel.VisibleItemCount

summary.para: Gets or sets the number of items that are visible to an end-user along a path at one time.
This proeprty is not in effect when a path is specified via the property.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the number of items that are visible to an end-user along a path at one time.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

summary.para: Lists values that specify how the carousel path is resized when the control’s size changes.
The item path aspect ratio is preserved in its original state, when resizing the control.
The item path aspect ratio is adjusted to match the carousel’s dimensions, when resizing the control.
